spaceGroupName.description: Name of space group, to use for processing input. Names may include alternative settings. Matches mmCIF item symmetry.space_group_name_H-M (https://mmcif.wwpdb.org/dictionaries/mmcif_pdbx_v50.dic/Items/_symmetry.space_group_name_H-M.html).
spaceGroupName.title: Space Group Name

unitCell.description: Unit cell of crystal, to use for processing input.
